00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Implements the list of known functions
00004 #
00005 package Parser::Context::Functions;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Value::Context::Data);
00008 
00009 sub init {
00010   my $self = shift;
00011   $self->{dataName} = 'functions';
00012   $self->{name} = 'function';
00013   $self->{Name} = 'Function';
00014   $self->{namePattern} = qr/[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*/;
00015   $self->{tokenType} = 'fn';
00016 }
00017 
00018 #
00019 #  Remove a function from the list by assigning it
00020 #    the undefined function.  This means it will still
00021 #    be recognized by the parser, but will generate an
00022 #    error message whenever it is used.  The old class
00023 #    is saved so that it can be redefined again.
00024 #
00025 sub undefine {
00026   my $self = shift;
00027   my @data = ();
00028   foreach my $x (@_) {
00029     push(@data,$x => {
00030       oldClass => $self->get($x)->{class},
00031       class => 'Parser::Function::undefined',
00032     });
00033   }
00034   $self->set(@data);
00035 }
00036 
00037 sub redefine {
00038   my $self = shift; my $X = shift;
00039   return $self->SUPER::redefine($X,@_) if scalar(@_) > 0;
00040   $X = [$X] unless ref($X) eq 'ARRAY';
00041   my @data = ();
00042   foreach my $x (@{$X}) {
00043     my $oldClass = $self->get($x)->{oldClass};
00044     push(@data,$x => {class => $oldClass, oldClass => undef})
00045       if $oldClass;
00046   }
00047   $self->set(@data);
00048 }
00049 
00050 #########################################################################
00051 #
00052 #  Handle enabling and disabling functions
00053 #
00054 
00055 my %Category = (
00056    SimpleTrig  => [qw(sin cos tan sec csc cot)],
00057    InverseTrig => [qw(asin acos atan asec acsc acot
00058               arcsin arccos arctan arcsec arccsc arccot atan2)],
00059 
00060    SimpleHyperbolic  => [qw(sinh cosh tanh sech csch coth)],
00061    InverseHyperbolic => [qw(asinh acosh atanh asech acsch acoth
00062                             arcsinh arccosh arctanh arcsech arccsch arccoth)],
00063 
00064    Numeric     => [qw(log log10 exp sqrt abs int sgn ln logten)],
00065 
00066    Vector      => [qw(norm unit)],
00067 
00068    Complex     => [qw(arg mod Re Im conj)],
00069 
00070    Hyperbolic  => [qw(_alias_ SimpleHyperbolic InverseHyperbolic)],
00071    Trig        => [qw(_alias_ SimpleTrig InverseTrig Hyperbolic)],
00072    All         => [qw(_alias_ Trig Numeric Vector Complex)],
00073 );
00074 
00075 sub disable {Disable(@_)}
00076 sub Disable {
00077   my $context = Parser::Context->current;
00078   if (ref($_[0]) ne "") {$context = (shift)->{context}}
00079   my @names = @_; my ($list,$name);
00080   while ($name = shift(@names)) {
00081     $list = $Category{$name};
00082     $list = [$name] if !$list && $context->{functions}{$name};
00083     unless (defined($list)) {warn "Undefined function or category '$name'"; next}
00084     if ($list->[0] eq '_alias_')
00085       {unshift @names, @{$list}[1..scalar(@{$list})-1]; next}
00086     $context->functions->undefine(@{$list});
00087   }
00088 }
00089 
00090 sub enable {Enable(@_)}
00091 sub Enable {
00092   my $context = Parser::Context->current;
00093   my $functions = $Parser::Context::Default::context{Full}->{functions};
00094   if (ref($_[0]) ne "") {$context = (shift)->{context}}
00095   my @names = @_; my ($list,$name);
00096   while ($name = shift(@names)) {
00097     $list = $Category{$name};
00098     $list = [$name] if !$list && $context->{functions}{$name};
00099     unless (defined($list)) {warn "Undefined function or category '$name'"; next}
00100     if ($list->[0] eq '_alias_')
00101       {unshift @names, @{$list}[1..scalar(@{$list})-1]; next}
00102     my @fn; foreach my $f (@{$list})
00103       {push @fn, $f => {class => $functions->{$f}{class}}}
00104     $context->functions->set(@fn);
00105   }
00106 }
